message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $15,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest. While $15,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this product offers significant value, even at this price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
